projects.appBio: Get Our App Now Enjoy The Services Provided
projects.fullDescription: Guidlle is an application that offers access to educational resources from primary school through employment, It helps you in obtaining your lessons in all stages of education and testing on them, and helps you in choosing your college in the correct academic way using artificial intelligence.

futureList.future: Follow your lessons constantly
Reminding you of lesson times
Evaluating the educational level with tests on each lesson
Giving financial prizes to outstanding students
Advanced search to find best instructors for your materials .

projects.fullDescription: Bareq application that helps you learn the Arabic language by measuring your level by entering the application by testing you and then determining your level. At each level during the application there is a test to measure your understanding.

futureList.future: Your Learning Arabic Partner.
Learn the Arabic language from the beginning or strengthen yourself in it if you have studied it before .
Follow Arabic language lessons in a fun and easy way .
Measure the level of response through a test on each lesson .
Prepare reports for each lesson and each level to measure your level of excellence .

projects.fullDescription: Schoopedia is An application that helps you follow your lessons by finding the best lessons for the subjects on YouTube.

futureList.future: Enjoy a better and faster user interface.
You can offer your product for sale easily, smoothly, and quickly, much more than before, and in fewer steps.
You can set a fixed price for your commodity or make it on a bidding process, and then you can set a default bid, or leave the matter open to bidders.
You will receive a notification whenever someone adds a higher bid than previously recorded.

Once a bid is accepted, the bidding process will be closed on the commodity, and a chat will be opened between you and the buyer for a direct agreement on the sale. If you both agree, you will choose (Item Sold Out) to show everyone that the commodity is (Sold).
The buyer will also receive a notification with a message when his bid is accepted and he can reply to you directly.
You can now also respond to buyers' comments on your item.
